conversion_verification.notes: Successful 3D axonometric conversion with clear wall geometry and cutaway.

3d_conversion_fundamentals.notes: Excellent wall height and thickness. Minimal perspective distortion. Interior volumes are very clear.

geometric_accuracy.notes: Room layout is largely faithful. Minor discrepancies in door swing representations and the external staircase area is simplified.

interior_elements.notes: Kitchen cabinetry and major furniture (bed, couch) match the plan's location and scale well.

visual_clarity.notes: Monochromatic style provides high structural clarity. No text contamination.

detected_errors.description: Staircase area on the right side of the plan is rendered as an enclosed space/room rather than a clear descending stairwell.

summary: A highly accurate and clean 3D conversion that meticulously translates the 2D floor plan into a readable 3D model.
